 1998-11411998-06-180FIN,  ,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisEnactment of the FEDERAL BOOK REBATE (GST/HST) REGULATIONS which establish a list of literacy-promoting charities and non-profit organizations who are entitled to a 100% rebate of the Goods and Services Tax, or the federal portion of the harmonized sales tax, paid on printed books or on audio recordings thereof, and on printed versions of religious Scriptures.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1998-0351 Publication Date: 1998-07-08
